_easter_egg.tap_to_play: T A P  T O  P L A Y

_notification.title: Can you wear shorts today?
_notification.subtitle: Open the app to find out

_purchase_ok_sheet.title: Purchase success!
_purchase_ok_sheet.text: You can now enjoy a ad-free experience

_purchase_failed_sheet.title: Something went wrong
_purchase_failed_sheet.text: Unfortunately your purchase has failed, please try again later.

_uv_index_sheet.title: UV-index
_uv_index_sheet.text:
Solar power is defined on a scale from 0 to 16. The effects of various solar powers are listed below.

0-2: Weak solar power, you can safely sit outside without any protection

3-7: Average solar power, use sunblock and seek shade in the afternoon

8-11: Very high solar power, avoid going outside in the afternoon. Use sunscreen

11-16: Exteme solar power, do not go outside in the afternoon. Use sunscreen, sunburn will occur quickly

_location_type_sheet.title: Will you share your location with us?
_location_type_sheet.text: Your location will be used to determine whether or not you can wear shorts, you can opt to manually enter a location

_ask_location_sheet.title: Please enter your location
_ask_location_sheet.text: You have chosen to manually select a location. You can allways chose to automatically share your location!

_url_launcher_sheet.title: Pay attention!
_url_launcher_sheet.text:
You will be sent to your browser.

This may take a few seconds.

_filter_information_sheet.title: Information on filters
_filter_information_sheet.text:
When opening this app, you have undoutebly wondered whether you can wear shorts, but what determines if you can?

First of all the temperature is checked. Using the average filter means that this must be more than 15 degrees celsius.

Next, the chance of rain is checked. If this is less than 90%, it will be concluded that you can wear shorts! :)
_filter_information_sheet.current: Your current filter minimum temperature is currently {temperature} and the maximum rainchance is {chance}%.

_webshop_sheet.title: NIEUW: Webshop!
_webshop_sheet.text: Wist jij dat we sinds kort een webshop hebben? Zo kan je tijdens die magische dag een passend kledingstuk vinden!

_graph.title: Are you wearing shorts today?
_graph.text: Vote here for what you're wearing. After that, you can see what others are wearing!

_share.yes: You can wear shorts in {location} today! The expected temperature today will be {temp}°C with a {chance}% chance of rain
_share.bo: Sadly, you cannot wear shorts in {location} today...  The expected temperature today will be {temp}°C with a {chance}% chance of rain
